/help.description: Shows how to use each of the commands.

/suggest [title] [description].description: Suggest an idea for the ScratchTools extension.

/bugreport [title] [description].description: Report a bug in the ScratchTools extension.

/rank [user].description: Shows any user's rank in the server.

/connect.description: Connects your Scratch account to your server profile.

/profile [user].description: Finds data on a specified Scratcher.

/suggestion_answer [answer] [message id].description: Answers a suggestion and whether or not it is approved.

/bug_answer [answer] [message id].description: Answers a bug report and whether or not it is valid.

/warn [user] [reason].description: Warn any user. This will let them know they were warned.

/slowmode [time].description: Set the slowmode for whichever channel you're in.

!aboutme [about me].description: Set your server about me that shows when someone uses /rank.
